metadata.description: Queen Jacquelyn of Villeneuve is a benevolent ruler, a loving mother, a devoted wife, and a woman with a monstrous score to settle. Set more than a century before the events of Damsels, this gigantic one-shot tells the tale of one woman's quest for ultimate revenge. By sword, or by sorcery, all shall be slain.
metadata.name: Damsels: Giant Killer
